casebody.data:
No. 337,

October Term, 1944.

International Union of Mine, Mill & Smelter Workers Locals Nos. 15, 17, 107, 108 and 111 (C. I. O.) et al. v. Eagle-Picher Mining & Smelting Co. et al. October 8, 1945.

The motions for leave to withdraw the petitions for rehearings’are granted. 325 U. S. 335.
